item.title: La Dolce Villa Review: I'm Surprised Netflix's Tension-Free Rom-Com Held My Attention For As Long As It Did
item.description: The result is a mixed bag that I enjoyed occasionally, though its inability to spark a greater emotional reaction is the film’s greatest weakness.

item.title: Terminator 7's Perfect Arnold Schwarzenegger Replacement Is Appearing In A Movie With Him This Year
item.description: The Terminator franchise needs to move on from Schwarzenegger if it's going to survive, and his perfect replacement will share the screen with him.

item.title: All 7 Movies From Disney’s “Weird Period,” Ranked
item.description: Between 1998 and 2004, Disney's Florida Animation Studio was given a lot of creative liberty, but not all of the "weird period" films rank the same.
